about_the_game:
Welcome to Youniverse, a vibrant life simulation and social metaverse where you can be whoever you want and experience exciting adventures with friends! Build your online identity, express your creativity, and explore a vast virtual world full of fun activities.

In Youniverse, you’ll start by customizing your avatar, personalizing everything from your outfit to your hairstyle to create a unique persona. From there, the world is yours to explore! Decorate your own apartment with endless customization options, transforming it into your dream home. Invite friends over, chat, and even enjoy YouTube videos together on your in-game TV.

Feeling social? Head out into the city to meet new people, take selfies in stunning locations, and dive into thrilling multiplayer games. Up for a challenge? Race up to 8 friends in Sprint Fury, a fast-paced cycling competition where the top spot on the leaderboard is always up for grabs. Or channel your inner barista in Barista Challenge, where speed and accuracy are key to fulfilling coffee orders before time runs out. Fancy testing your smarts? Compete in Trivia Thrill to prove who’s the ultimate trivia master.

Key Features:

Fully customizable avatars to express your personal style
Design and decorate your own apartment, invite friends over, and hang out
Explore the vibrant Youniverse city and capture epic selfies
Multiplayer racing excitement in Sprint Fury – can you be the fastest?
Master the art of coffee-making in Barista Challenge
Flex your brainpower in Trivia Thrill
Enjoy a connected social experience with proximity voice and text chat

Whether you're looking to chill with friends, challenge yourself, or explore a world full of possibilities, Youniverse offers a unique and engaging experience that’s all about connecting, competing, and creating. Your journey begins here—welcome to the Youniverse!

name: Youniverse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10th Gen or higher / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU/Video card with 2GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card (eg. built-in)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10th Gen or higher / AMD Ryzen 5 5600G or higher
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia RTX 2050 or higher / AMD Radeon 6500XT or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card

short_description: Customize your avatar, decorate your apartment, and explore a vibrant city in Youniverse, a social metaverse and life simulation. Race friends in Sprint Fury, master coffee-making in Barista Challenge, and test your trivia knowledge in Trivia Thrill. Create, connect, and compete!
supported_languages:
English*, Malay
